      • isAccessible

        public boolean isAccessible(vg.civcraft.mc.namelayer.permission.PermissionType pType,
                   org.bukkit.entity.Player p)
        Returns true if the player has access to do the specified PermissionType on this reinforcement.
        Parameters:
        PermissionType -
        Player -
        Returns:
        true if the player has access or false if the player doesn't have access to that specified permission or isn't on the group.

      • isBypassable

        public boolean isBypassable(org.bukkit.entity.Player p)
        Is used to see if a player has permission to bypass a reinforcement.
        Parameters:
        The - Player who wants to bypass a Reinforcemet.
        Returns:
        Returns if the Player can or not.

      • isInsecure

        public boolean isInsecure()
        Returns:

        Toggles whether or not the block is insecure.

      • setInsecure

        public void setInsecure(boolean bool)
        Set the status of either insecure or secure. Mostly used with hoppers to allow or disallow the transfer of items from one hopper to another if they are on separate groups.
        Parameters:
        bool -
